item.title: Contact
item.description: Martin Tomko, PhD. Senior Lecturer in Spatial Information Department of Infrastructure Engineering The University of Melbourne 3010 VIC, Australia E: martin -AT- tomko [DOT] org

item.title: Quick summary of Semester 1, 2019 (apologies for slow updates)
item.description: The intense first semester is now over for me. I had a great time, interacting with amazing masters students of Spatial Databases and of Spatial Information Programming, and introducing a new generation of students to GIS in the Applications of GIS course.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a Spatial Information Scientist and geographic information systems expert.

item.title: Come and help us breathe life into the future of Mapping!
item.description: We have acquired an exciting new piece of equipment â€“ a Clearpath Robotics Husky Autonomous Ground Vehicle, fully kitted with a variety of sensors, including automotive-standard Velodyne LIDAR.
